mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.name AS category_name FROM product_info p LEFT JOIN product_category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_info (category_id, name, description, image, points_price, stock, limit_per_user, status, create_by, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{image}, #{pointsPrice}, #{stock}, #{limitPerUser}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE product_info SET stock = stock - #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id} AND stock >= #{quantity}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(eoi.quantity), 0) FROM exchange_order_item eoi INNER JOIN exchange_order eo ON eoi.order_id = eo.id WHERE eo.user_id = #{userId} AND eoi.product_id = #{productId} AND eo.status IN (0, 1, 2) -- 待发货、已发货、已完成
